Fui a celebrar mi aniversario con mi novia, ya que a ella le encanta la comida Mexicana , y la verdad el lugar muy lindo, la musica  normal , se podia conversar. Pero mi novia se decepciono de la comida ya que ella esperaba comida tipica mexicana , y los burritos  no eran burritos parecian fajitas,pedimos queso crema y nos dieron queso agrio con sabor a lima. Los tragos son para tener en cuenta que son  muy ricos. El precio en general no era para nada barato.
Asi que si queiren  real comida mexicana .. vayana a otro lado ..saludos

As a foreigner who has eaten Mexican in several countries, I would not recommend it. Ambience and service is good, but the food served is Thai, NOT MEXICAN at all, the burrito is a thai wrap and the quesedilla, well it is another thai wrap but folded like taco style. For me a big disappointment. The flavour is there, but again Thai flavour. If you would like to have Mexican food maybe you should try a Thai restaurant and see what they have to offer.
